pages.policy: Privacy Policy at Colpo Ricco: Safeguarding Your Information Learn about how Colpo Ricco protects your privacy. Find out about the odds of winning and the game rules on the website www.adm.gov.it, on this page and at the points of sale. Gambling can cause addiction pathology Gaming prohibited for children under 18 + Colpo Ricco Colpo Ricco Play Online Play Privacy Policy 1. Information we collect Personal information, such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address, which you provide to us when you create an account, make a purchase, subscribe to our newsletter, or communicate with us. Automatically collected information, such as your IP address, browser type, device type, and operating system, which is gathered through the use of cookies and other tracking technologies. 2. How we use your information Provide and maintain our website and online services. Process transactions and orders, and ship products to you. Send promotional emails, newsletters, and other communications about our products, services, and events. Personalize your experience and tailor our content to your interests and preferences. 3. Legal basis for processing your information Contractual obligations: We need your personal information to fulfill our obligations stated in our terms and conditions and to provide you with the products and services you have requested. Consent: We will ask for your consent to process your personal information for specific purposes, such as sending marketing communications. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. Legitimate interests: We may process your personal information based on our legitimate interests, such as improving our website, services, and marketing efforts, as long as these interests do not override your privacy rights and freedoms. 4. Sharing your information Service providers and partners: We work with trusted third-party service providers and partners who help us provide our website, services, and customer support. These entities may have access to your personal information as needed to perform their functions on our behalf. Payment processors: We use reputable payment processors to handle transactions and process payments. These processors may have access to your payment information, but we do not store or process this data on our servers. Business transfers: If Colpo Ricco undergoes a merger, acquisition, or sale, your personal information may be transferred to the new entity. In this case, we will provide notice and, if necessary, obtain your consent. Legal reasons: We may disclose your personal information if we believe it is necessary to comply with legal obligations, court orders, or regulatory requirements, or to protect our rights and property. 5. Data retention We retain your personal information for as long as is necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes. We may also maintain a limited version of your information to comply with our financial reporting and other obligations. 6. Cookies and tracking technologies Colpo Ricco uses cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze website usage, and serve targeted advertisements. You can control and manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings and by using opt-out tools provided by third-party advertisers. 7. Third-party websites and services Our website may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these entities. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit. 8. Children's privacy Colpo Ricco does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it immediately. 9. Your rights In certain jurisdictions, you have the right to request access to, rectification, erasure, restriction, or portability of your personal information. You also have the right to object to processing and to withdraw your consent. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information in the 'Contact Us' section below. 10. Data security Colpo Ricco takes reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information. 11. Changes to our privacy policy We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. If changes are significant, we will notify you by email or through a prominent notice on our website. We encourage you to review our privacy policy periodically for any updates or changes. Gambling can cause addiction pathology Gaming prohibited for children under 18 + Colpo Ricco Colpo Ricco Play Online Play Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Colpo Ricco, a global leader in luxury fashion and accessories, is committed to providing an exceptional online shopping experience for its valued customers. By accessing and using our website, www.colporicco.com (the 'Website'), you acknowledge and agree to be bound by the following Terms and Conditions (the 'Terms'). Please read these Terms carefully before using the Website. If you do not agree to these Terms, please refrain from using the Website. 2. Definitions 'Account' means a personal account created by a User on the Website to manage their purchases, track their orders, and access exclusive content and offers. 'Content' refers to all content available on the Website, including text, images, graphics, videos, designs, logos, trademarks, and other materials. 'Products' refer to the luxury fashion items and accessories offered for sale on the Website. 'User' refers to any individual or entity accessing or using the Website, whether or not they have registered for an Account. 3. Use of the Website You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Website for your personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not use the Website or any of its Content for any illegal or unauthorized purposes, including but not limited to unauthorized downloading, copying, transmitting, modifying, or creating derivative works. You must be at least 18 years of age or have the consent of a legal guardian to use the Website. 4. Purchases Products available for purchase on the Website are subject to availability and may change at any time without notice. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when placing an order for Products. Prices listed on the Website are in [Currency] and include all applicable taxes and duties. 5. Payment You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for any fees charged by your payment provider. olpo Ricco takes reasonable measures to ensure the security of your payment information, but cannot be held liable for any unauthorized use of your payment details. 6. Shipping and Delivery Products purchased on the Website will be shipped to the address provided by you during checkout. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on the destination and shipping method selected. Colpo Ricco is not responsible for any delays or missed deliveries caused by external factors, including but not limited to weather, customs regulations, or acts of God. 7. Returns and Exchanges Colpo Ricco offers a 30-day return and exchange policy for all Products purchased on the Website. Products must be returned in their original condition, unworn, and with all tags and packaging intact. Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the User. 8. Warranty and Liability Colpo Ricco warrants that all Products sold on the Website are free from defects in materials and workmanship for a period of 12 months from the date of purchase. Colpo Ricco's liability is limited to the replacement or refund of defective Products. Colpo Ricco is not liable for any indirect, consequential, punitive, or special damages arising from the use of the Website or the purchase of Products. 9. Privacy Policy Colpo Ricco respects the privacy of its Users. The company's Privacy Policy describes how personal data is collected, used, and protected. By using the Website, you acknowledge and agree to the terms of the Privacy Policy.
